Author: Yoru Shokohime
Name: Candy Coat
Punchline: Private venue assistant with role-based toolboxes for Sugar.
Description: Private plugin for the Sugar venue. Provides role-specific toolboxes (Sweetheart, Candy Heart, Bartender, Gamba, DJ, Management, Owner) with session timers, order tracking, earnings logging, and patron management. Main commands: /candy (main UI), /cset (settings), /cbook (bookings).
